<Text: Josef Peukert (22 January 1855 – 3 March 1910) was a German Bohemian anarchist known for his autobiographical book "Memoirs from the proletarian revolutionary labour movement" (German: "Erinnerungen eines Proletariers aus der revolutionären Arbeiterbewegung" ).>
